metadata.title: CVE-2024-34447 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bouncy Castle Java Cryptography APIs before BC1.78. When endpoint identification is enabled in the BCJSSE and an SSLsocket is created without an explicit hostname (as happens withHttpsURLConnection), hostname verification could be performed against aDNS-resolved IP address in some situations, opening up a possibility of DNSpoisoning.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
